purpose: To manage tasks and enable communication between AI agents through a standardized protocol.
principle: Utilizes the Agent2Agent (A2A) protocol to enable seamless task delegation and coordination among AI agents.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API support for easy integration into existing AI systems, allowing for plug-and-play task management capabilities.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may involve incomplete features and potential bugs. Limited to environments supporting TypeScript.
name: elkar-a2a
description: Elkar - Task management for AI Agents, ready for Agent2Agent (A2A) protocol
highlight: Facilitates task management and coordination between AI agents using the Agent2Agent (A2A) protocol.
